channel.title: Opencv on Have a nice day, cheio
channel.description: Recent content in Opencv on Have a nice day, cheio

item.title: Install OpenCV and Compile cpp file for MAC
item.description: Install OpenCV and Compile cpp file for Mac ####安装OpenCV2 brew install opencv@2 echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/opt/opencv@2/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc export LDFLAGS="-L/usr/local/opt/opencv@2/lib" export CPPFLAGS="-I/usr/local/opt/opencv@2/include" export PKG_CONFIG_PATH="/usr/local/opt/opencv@2/lib/pkgconfig" # 不知道这些环境变量是不是必要的，但还是按照提示执行了 编译C++程序 安
